title: Discord

usage: Used for supporting the community and providing help.

title: GitHub

usage: Used for hosting the source code, building and distributing the releases.

title: Electron

usage: Used for building the cross-platform desktop application.

title: Electron Builder

usage: Used for building the cross-platform desktop application.

title: Svelte
usage: Used for building the user interface.

title: Tailwind CSS

title: DaisyUI

usage: Used for styling the user interface.

title: eslint
description: Find and fix problems in your JavaScript code.

title: Vscode
description: Visual Studio Code is a code editor redefined and optimized for building and debugging modern web and cloud applications.

title: Neovim
description: Vim-fork focused on extensibility and usability.

title: Vite

usage: Used for building and developing the application.

title: TypeScript

title: Monaco Editor
